title: Ticagrelor is as safe and effective as clopidogrel after heart attack

title_detail.value: Ticagrelor is as safe and effective as clopidogrel after heart attack

summary: Patients given clot busters to treat a heart attack fared equally well if they were given the standard blood thinning medication clopidogrel versus the newer, more potent drug ticagrelor, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Patients given clot busters to treat a heart attack fared equally well if they were given the standard blood thinning medication clopidogrel versus the newer, more potent drug ticagrelor, according to new research.
